Pulzar 0.4 Documentation¶

Welcome to Pulzar 0.4 documentation Pulzar is new experimental programming language. User can use dynamic typing with optional types.

Guide¶

  • OOP: Classes and @identity
  • Macros

Introduction¶

Pulzar is a experimental programming language created by Brian Turza. The syntax of pulzar was inspired by languages from static languages like C to dynamic ones like Python.
